page: MA60061: Statistical Technique And Computer Programming

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Estimation and hypothesis testing, correlation and regression, analysis of variance (one way and two way classification). Programming preliminaries, some simple program in C, numeric constants and variables, arithmetic expression, input and output conditional statements, loops, arrays, logical expressions, functions, character strings enumerated data type and stacks, structures.
